title: Highlights Folder
body: So my Dad recently reinstalled windows to get rid of some glitches in the computer. In my highlights tab in my profile, my highlights are gone, I see the Document "Highlights"  in my start menu and in it all my highlights but I don`t know how to transfer them back into the game because they don`t just replay from that folder. Please help!

replies.body: Highlights are spliced from the replay itself, so it can't be viewed through the game.  You should be able to view it in a web browser or video player, but our [replay guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips) should offer more info and options as well.
